## Field.doValueUpdate\_() method

Used to update the value of a field. Can be overridden by subclasses to do custom storage of values/updating of external things.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected doValueUpdate_(newValue: AnyDuringMigration): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newValue | AnyDuringMigration | The value to be saved. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
